shortdesc.ph: Configuration for the low-quality video stream.
Configuration for the video low stream.

plentry.pd: Video dimensions. See . The default value is 50% of the high-quality video stream.
Video bitrate (Kbps). The default value is -1. You do not need to set this parameter. The SDK automatically selects the optimal bitrate based on the configured video resolution and frame rate.
Video frame rate (fps). The default value is 5.
Video dimensions. See . The default value is 50% of the main stream resolution.
Video bitrate (Kbps), default is -1. This parameter does not need to be set; the SDK will automatically match the most appropriate bitrate based on the resolution and frame rate you set.
Video dimensions. See . The default value is 50% of the high stream.
Video bitrate (Kbps). The default value is -1. You don't need to set this parameter. The SDK automatically selects the optimal bitrate based on the resolution and frame rate you set.
Video frame rate (fps). The default value is 5.
Video resolution. See . Default is 50% of the high stream resolution.
Video bitrate (Kbps), default is -1. This parameter does not need to be set; the SDK automatically matches the optimal bitrate based on the configured resolution and frame rate.
